指折り数える: (ゆびおりかぞえる) - to count on one's fingers
指揮をとる: (しきをとる) - to take command; to give direction
指揮を取る: (しきをとる) - to take command; to give direction
指揮を執る: (しきをとる) - to take command; to give direction
指揮所演習: (しきじょえんしゅう) - command post exercise
指揮棒: (しきぼう) - conductor's stick; conductor's baton
指揮権: (しきけん) - (exercising) the right to command
指揮系統: (しきけいとう) - chain of command
指数: (しすう) - index; index number; exponent (e.g. in floating-point representation); characteristic
指数演算子: (しすうえんざんし) - exponential operator
指数的成長: (しすうてきせいちょう) - exponential growth
指数部: (しすうぶ) - exponent portion; characteristic (e.g. in floating-point representation)
指数関数: (しすうかんすう) - exponential function; exponentiation function
指文字: (ゆびもじ) - fingerspelling (in sign language for the deaf); finger alphabet
指板: (ゆびいた) - fingerboard/fretboard; (ゆびいた only) finger plate
指標データ項目: (しひょうデータこうもく) - index data item
指標レジスタ: (しひょうレジスタ) - index register
指標付きアドレス: (しひょうつきアドレス) - indexed address
指標付き色指定: (しひょうつきいろしてい) - indexed colour
指点字: (ゆびてんじ) - finger Braille; system of communicating with the deaf-blind in which the receiver's fingers are tapped like a Braille typewriter
指物: (さしもの) - (usu. 指(し)物) cabinetwork/joinery; (often 挿(し)物) hair ornament/hairpin; colours/banner/small banner worn by soldiers during battle (for identification) from the Sengoku period to the end of the Edo period
指矩: (さしがね) - carpenter's square; (差し金, 差金, 指金 only) instigation/suggestion
指示す: (さししめす) - to indicate; to show; to point to
指示を出す: (しじをだす) - to give directions; to issue instructions
指示代名詞: (しじだいめいし) - (e.g. それ, これ, あれ, etc.) demonstrative pronoun
指笛: (ゆびぶえ) - whistling through one's fingers; whistle made by sticking ones fingers in ones mouth and blowing
指箸: (さしばし) - pointing towards somebody or something with one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
指縄: (さしなわ) - halter (for restraining a horse, etc.)
指羽: (さしば) - large fan-shaped object held by an attendant and used to conceal the face of a noble, etc.
指背歩行: (しはいほこう) - knuckle-walking (e.g. by chimpanzees, etc.)
指行性: (しこうせい) - digitigrade (walking on the toes)
指詰め: (ゆびつめ) - getting one's finger caught (e.g. in a door)/getting one's finger pinched/jamming one's finger in a door; yakuza finger-cutting ritual
指話法: (しわほう) - finger language; signing; sign language
指遣い: (ゆびづかい) - fingering (of a musical instrument)
指金: (ゆびがね) - (finger) ring; metal thimble; ring used to constrict a finger to make it small and beautiful
指針: (shishin) - needle (bússola, medidor, etc.), hand (clock), indicator, pointer, index; guiding principle, guideline, guide
指骨: (しこつ) - phalanx (phalange) of the hand; phalanx (phalange) of the foot
按じる: (あんじる) - (案じる only)  to be anxious or concerned about/to ponder (anxiously)/to fear; to investigate/to consider/to plan; (按じる only) to pat/to rub/to take a sword in one's hand
按ずる: (あんずる) - (案ずる only)  to be anxious or concerned about/to ponder (anxiously)/to fear; to investigate/to consider/to plan; (按ずる only) to pat/to rub/to take a sword in one's hand
按分: (あんぶん) - proportional division; proportional distribution
按察: (あぜち) - travelling inspector of the provincial governments (Nara- and Heian-period position)
按察使: (あんさつし) - travelling inspector of the provincial governments (Nara- and Heian-period position)
按手: (あんじゅ) - ordination; laying on of hands
按手礼: (あんしゅれい) - (Protestant) laying on of hands; ordination
按排: (あんばい) - (esp. 塩梅) seasoning/flavour/flavor; (esp. 塩梅) condition/state/situation; (esp. 按排, 按配, 案配, 安排) arrangement/assignment/adjustment
按摩: (あんま) - massage, esp. the Anma Japanese type of massage; masseur/masseuse/massager; blind person (as many were traditionally massagers)
按摩マッサージ指圧師: (あんまマッサージしあつし) - licensed masseur; licensed masseuse
按配: (あんばい) - (esp. 塩梅) seasoning/flavour/flavor; (esp. 塩梅) condition/state/situation; (esp. 按排, 按配, 案配, 安排) arrangement/assignment/adjustment
按針: (あんじん) - navigation by magnetic compass; pilot
挌技: (かくぎ) - martial arts which involve fighting without weapons; combat sport; one-on-one fighting sport
挌技場: (かくぎじょう) - training place; dojo
挌闘: (かくとう) - hand-to-hand fighting; grappling; scuffling
挌闘技: (かくとうぎ) - martial arts which involve fighting without weapons; combat sport; one-on-one fighting sport
挑む: (idomu) - to challenge to (uma luta, jogo, etc.), to throw down the gauntlet, to contend for; to tackle (e.g. a problem), to attempt, to go after (a prize, record, etc.) , to challenge to (a fight, game, etc.), to throw down the gauntlet, to contend for; to tackle (e.g. a problem), to attempt, to go after (a prize, record, etc.); to pressure (someone) for sex, to make advances to
挑戦いかに: (ちょうせんいかに) - How dare you!
挑戦権: (ちょうせんけん) - right to challenge; right to make a challenge
挑戦状: (ちょうせんじょう) - written challenge
